description: Returns details about a state machine alias.

parameters.name: stateMachineAliasArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the state machine alias.

nested_items.name: stateMachineAliasArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the state machine alias.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the state machine alias.

nested_items.name: routingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The routing configuration of the alias.

nested_items.name: stateMachineVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies one or two state machine versions defined in the routing configuration.

nested_items.name: weight
nested_items.description: The percentage of traffic you want to route to a state machine version. The sum of the weights in the routing configuration must be equal to 100.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date the state machine alias was created.

nested_items.name: updateDate
nested_items.description: The date the state machine alias was last updated.
